CodeEditApp /

      CodeEdit---CodeEdit App for macOS – Elevate your code editing experience. Open source, free forever.

HibiKier /

      zhenxun_bot---基于 Nonebot2 和 go-cqhttp 开发，以 postgresql 作为数据库，非常可爱的绪山真寻bot

newpanjing /

      gofound---GoFound GoLang Full text search go语言全文检索引擎 基于平衡二叉树+正排索引、倒排索引实现 可支持亿级数据，毫秒级查询。 使用简单，使用http接口，任何系统都可以使用。

0xAX /

      linux-insides---A little bit about a linux kernel

cilium /

      tetragon---eBPF-based Security Observability and Runtime Enforcement

gin-gonic /

      gin---Gin is a HTTP web framework written in Go (Golang). It features a Martini-like API with much better performance -- up to 40 times faster. If you need smashing performance, get yourself some Gin.

simonbs /

      Runestone---📝 Performant plain text editor for iOS with syntax highlighting, line numbers, invisible characters and much more.

hpcaitech /

      ColossalAI---Colossal-AI: A Unified Deep Learning System for Big Model Era

rzashakeri /

      beautify-github-profile---This repository helps you to have a more beautiful and attractive github profile, and you can access a complete set of tools and guides for beautifying your github profile. 🪄 ⭐

microsoft /

      Web-Dev-For-Beginners---24 Lessons, 12 Weeks, Get Started as a Web Developer

BohemiaInteractive /

      Arma-Reforger-Samples---Modding Samples

catchorg /

      Catch2---A modern, C++-native, test framework for unit-tests, TDD and BDD - using C++14, C++17 and later (C++11 support is in v2.x branch, and C++03 on the Catch1.x branch)

ossu /

      computer-science---🎓 Path to a free self-taught education in Computer Science!

PatrikH0lop /

      malware_showcase---Understand the nature of malicious software with practical examples in Python.

jackfrued /

      Python-100-Days---Python - 100天从新手到大师

liyupi /

      sql-generator---🔨 用 JSON 来生成结构化的 SQL 语句，基于 Vue3 + TypeScript + Vite + Ant Design + MonacoEditor 实现，项目简单（重逻辑轻页面）、适合练手~

evrone /

      go-clean-template---Clean Architecture template for Golang services

anhkgg /

      SuperRDP---Super RDPWrap

poteto /

      hiring-without-whiteboards---⭐️ Companies that don't have a broken hiring process

Mrs4s /

      go-cqhttp---cqhttp的golang实现，轻量、原生跨平台.

prometheus-operator /

      prometheus-operator---Prometheus Operator creates/configures/manages Prometheus clusters atop Kubernetes

microsoft /

      Data-Science-For-Beginners---10 Weeks, 20 Lessons, Data Science for All!

stackrox /

      stackrox---The StackRox Kubernetes Security Platform performs a risk analysis of the container environment, delivers visibility and runtime alerts, and provides recommendations to proactively improve security by hardening the environment.

UberGuidoZ /

      Flipper---Playground (and dump) of stuff I make or modify for the Flipper Zero

heartexlabs /

      label-studio---Label Studio is a multi-type data labeling and annotation tool with standardized output format
